name: MICA
description:
In a child's head the world is huge, colorful and fun! But not for everybody… Discover the cruel truth behind the makeup industry by deep diving into the caves of Mica mining. 

Crawl, mine and unravel the gruesome story of a young girl’s everyday life.

Credits:

  • Bartosz Witek (Game Design, Tools Programming & Story)
  • Kasper Lyfjell (Gameplay Programming & Game Design)
  • Irina Knudsen (3D Art, Level/Character Design, Environment)
  • Mia Bergmann (2D Art & Level Design, UI Design)
